events.name: KO:NNECT 2023
events.text: KO:NNECT is a mentoring program that matches pre-major underclassmen with upperclassmen in their major. Professionally organized event to assist students with academic and career guidance while allowing to network with peer students in the same field.

events.name: General Meeting
events.text: Introduction to our student organization at the beginning of the school year. Presented our visions and goals, upcoming events, organizational structure, and officer members.
